mapper.insert: insert into params (param_id, param_name, create_time, update_time, param_value) values (#{paramId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paramValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select param_id, param_name, create_time, update_time, param_value from params
